attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If this was truly a democracy and we truly had freedom of speech no petitions would be rejected.  It is within the Government's power to abolish political parties, stop MPs claiming expenses, and allow people to vote for a Prime Minister as opposed to a Political Party (all petitions rejected by this site), but rather not within the financial interest of Government Officials and not within the interest of the Government in stopping the people knowing the truth of the corruption in Government and Parliament.
Hamish Scott, 13 years old.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
